Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kirk Taylor "SANDIEGO"

} } } Length:: 4:23 MinsJust figured I could record a quick review and it would be better than anything I could write. Any questions just ask.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Color CCD image sensor. NTSC format
Construction: Aluminum. 28 infrared LEDs for night vision
Mini illumination 0 lux; 3.6mm Lens; Auto white balance; Auto Gain Control
Vandalproof; White color. Good for outdoor/indoor
Package included: 8 x Sony CCD cameras, 8 x 12V DC 500mA power supplies and 8 x security warning decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 x Built-in Sony CCD Outdoor Dome Security Cameras Infrared CCTV Home Surveillance Day Night Vision Weatherproof Vandal Proof 28 IR LEDs 480TVL Wide View Angle Lens with Free Power Supplies and Security Warning Decals CPZ
